<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>All the existing records in nlq_synonym table prior to Tokyo should have extend_to_all_child_tables set to false. The following fix script will handle the upgrade scenario to Tokyo.</description>
        <name>Set Extend To All Child Tables to False</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var nlqSynonymTable = 'nlq_synonym';
	var nlqExtendToAllChildTablesColumn = 'extend_to_all_child_tables';
	var nlqSynonymGR = new GlideRecord(nlqSynonymTable);
	nlqSynonymGR.addNullQuery(nlqExtendToAllChildTablesColumn);
	nlqSynonymGR.query();
	while (nlqSynonymGR.next()) { 
		nlqSynonymGR.setValue(nlqExtendToAllChildTablesColumn,false);
		nlqSynonymGR.setWorkflow(false);
		nlqSynonymGR.update();
	}
})();]]></script>
